Review Text: This water filter is amazing! Setup was super simple, took maybe 10 minutes. The water tastes so much cleaner than before, and I am excited to use the feature of notifications on my phone when the filter needs replacing. Arrived quickly! Great product!
It's okay. The water tastes fine, but the app is kinda clunky. It keeps asking me to log in again, which is annoying. Hopefully, they fix that in a future update.
DO NOT BUY! This thing started leaking all over my counter after just a few weeks. Tried contacting customer service, and they were completely unhelpful. Waste of money!

Really happy with this purchase. The water quality is fantastic, and I feel better knowing I'm not drinking all those chemicals. The smart water usage tracking in the app is also pretty neat. Arrived fast!
Does what it says. Water tastes alright. Not a huge difference from my tap water, but maybe it's healthier? The app is basic but functional.

The smart features are what sold me, and they don't disappoint! Being able to see how much water I've filtered and the estimated filter life is super convenient. Installation was also a breeze. Quick delivery!
The instructions for setting this up were not very clear, especially connecting it to the Wi-Fi. Took me a while to figure it out. Once connected, it seems to be working fine.
I used to buy tons of bottled water, but this filter has completely changed that. The water tastes so good, and it's much better for the environment. Highly recommend!
Be aware that this thing is quite large. It takes up a significant amount of space on my kitchen counter. Measure your space carefully before ordering. Otherwise, the water is good.
Had a small issue with the initial setup, but their customer support was excellent. They responded quickly and walked me through the fix. Very impressed with their service.
Definitely notice an improvement in the taste of our tap water. It used to taste a bit chlorine-y, but now it's much cleaner. Happy customer!
The app is constantly logging me out. It makes the smart features inconvenient to use, which is really frustrating considering that's a key reason I bought this filter.
Super easy to install, literally took me less than 5 minutes. The water tastes great, and the filter life indicator is a nice touch.
It's an ok filter for the price. I've had filters that made the water taste better, but this one is affordable and seems to do the job.
Feels very well-made and sturdy. I'm hoping it lasts a long time. The water tastes good, and I like the design.
The replacement filters are pretty expensive, which is something to consider in the long run. The water quality is decent though.
Very happy with the purchase and would recommend it to others.
I love how sleek and modern this filter looks in my kitchen. It doesn't take up too much space either. And the water tastes great!
The water flow is a bit slow for my liking. Takes a while to fill up my water bottle in the morning. Not a huge deal, but slightly inconvenient.
Honestly, the best water filter I've ever purchased. The water tastes incredible, and the smart features are actually really useful. I especially like the water consumption tracking.
Had some issues connecting to my Wi-Fi network. The instructions could have been much clearer. Eventually got it working after a few tries.
Great value for the money. Easy to install, water tastes good, and the app is functional. Can't ask for much more.
My filter makes a weird humming sound sometimes. It's not super loud, but it's noticeable and a little concerning.
Very happy with this filter! The water tastes so pure and clean. I feel much better about drinking tap water now.
The app provides helpful reminders about filter replacement. A great feature!
The water taste isn't as good as I was expecting for the price. It's not terrible, but I've definitely had better. Order was more than a week late though.
Tried contacting customer support through the app with a question, and they took forever to respond and weren't very helpful when they finally did.
Easy to install. Great addition to the kitchen.
The filter itself seems to be working okay, but the box it arrived in was pretty beat up. Luckily, the filter wasn't damaged.
I really like that this company is focused on being eco-friendly. It was a big factor in my decision to purchase this filter. And the water tastes great too!
The water has a slight metallic taste since I installed it. Hoping it goes away after a few more uses. Not very pleasant right now. Also, the order was super late.
Great filter for the price.
The smart features are a bit of a gimmick, in my opinion. I don't really need an app to tell me when to change the filter. But the water quality seems good.
Love having filtered water on tap whenever I need it. So much more convenient than buying bottled water all the time.
The product arrived very late and customer service wasnt helpful. The priduct iteself is very good!
Very satisfied with the performance of this water filter. It does exactly what it's supposed to do and the water tastes great.
The sleek design looks great on my countertop. It's not too bulky and blends in well with my other appliances.
It's an average filter. Nothing particularly stands out, but it's not bad either. Just a basic water filter with some smart features.
Had a little trouble with the initial setup, instruction manual wasn't super helpful. But I found a helpful video online that walked me through it. Working fine now.
If you're looking for a reliable water filter that provides clean and great-tasting water, I highly recommend this one!
The cost of replacement filters is a little high, which is something to keep in mind for the future.
I actually find the smart app to be quite useful for monitoring my water usage and the filter status. It's better than I expected.
This filter is way bigger than I thought it would be and doesn't really fit well on my counter. Wish I had paid closer attention to the dimensions.
Seems like a decent product. I've only had it for a week, so I'll have to see how it holds up over time.
The water tastes so much better than our old filter! A very noticeable improvement. Definitely worth the investment.
No problems with installation or setup at all. It was very straightforward and easy to get going.
My order arrived with a damaged box, and the filter itself looks like it might be cracked. Waiting to hear back from the seller about a replacement. Very frustrating experience.
For the price, it's a pretty good water filter. Does the job adequately. The expected delivery date is misleading, order came much late.
Arrived with a crack in the housing and leaked as soon as I hooked it up. Had to go through the hassle of returning it. Very disappointed in the quality control.
The water flow is noticeably slower compared to my old filter. It's a bit inconvenient. Also, the box was damaged when it arrived.
